item.title: Melissa add a quote by Bessie Anderson Stanley
Melissa add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "I believe in Christianity as I believe that the sun has risen: not only because I see it, but because by it I see everything else." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description: "How many observe Christ's birthday! How few, His precepts!" -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Carl Sandburg
item.description: "A baby is God's opinion that the world should go on." -- Carl Sandburg

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Logic will get you from A to Z; imagination will get you everywhere." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Melissa add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain
